_comment: SAM2 Product Detection Configuration - Upload to input stage root to customize
_docs: See README for parameter descriptions. Changes take effect after service restart.
_points_per_side_help: Grid density for point sampling (24x24=576 points). Higher = more detections but slower.
_pred_iou_thresh_help: Minimum IoU confidence score from SAM2 (0.0-1.0). Lowered from 0.92 to catch more products.
_min_fill_ratio_help: Minimum mask/bbox fill ratio. Lowered from 0.25 to catch products in white showcases.
_min_area_ratio_help: Minimum detection area as ratio of image. Lowered from 0.02 to catch smaller products.
_max_area_ratio_help: Maximum detection area as ratio of image. Increased to catch larger product showcases.
_min_aspect_ratio_help: Minimum width/height ratio. Slightly tightened from 0.15.
_max_aspect_ratio_help: Maximum width/height ratio. Slightly tightened from 6.0.
_border_margin_help: Pixels from image edge to consider 'touching border'. Increased to filter edge decorations.
_max_border_touches_help: Skip detections touching more than N borders (0-4). 1 = allow corner touches only.
_nms_threshold_help: Non-max suppression IoU threshold (0.0-1.0). Higher = more overlapping boxes kept.
_max_products_per_image_help: Maximum products to return per image.
_batch_size_help: Images per batch for parallel I/O. Higher = better throughput but more memory.
_num_workers_help: Parallel threads for image loading. 2-4 is usually optimal.
